original_text: People in all the kingdoms around Judah heard that the Lord had fought against Israel's enemies. So they became afraid of God's power.
korean_text: 이방 모든 나라가 여호와께서 이스라엘의 적군을 치셨다 함을 듣고 하나님을 두려워하므로

sentences.original_text: People in all the kingdoms around Judah heard
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 주위 모든 왕국의 사람들이 들었다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had fought against Israel's enemies
